org.webrtc

类 NetworkMonitor

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.webrtc.NetworkMonitor

  • public class NetworkMonitor
extends java.lang.Object
    Borrowed from Chromium's src/net/android/java/src/org/chromium/net/NetworkChangeNotifier.java Triggers updates to the underlying network state from OS networking events. WARNING: This class is not thread-safe.

    • 嵌套类概要

      嵌套类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      static interface  NetworkMonitor.NetworkObserver
      Alerted when the connection type of the network changes.

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 静态方法 具体方法

      Adds an observer for any connection type changes.

      static NetworkMonitor getInstance()
      Returns the singleton instance.
      static NetworkMonitor init(android.content.Context context)
      Initializes the singleton once.
      static boolean isInitialized() 
      static boolean isOnline()
      Checks if there currently is connectivity.
      static void removeNetworkObserver(NetworkMonitor.NetworkObserver observer)
      Removes an observer for any connection type changes.
      static void setAutoDetectConnectivityState(boolean shouldAutoDetect)
      Enables auto detection of the current network state based on notifications from the system.

    • 方法详细资料

      • init

        public static NetworkMonitor init(android.content.Context context)
        Initializes the singleton once. Called from the native code.

      • isInitialized

        public static boolean isInitialized()

      • getInstance

        public static NetworkMonitor getInstance()
        Returns the singleton instance.

      • setAutoDetectConnectivityState

        public static void setAutoDetectConnectivityState(boolean shouldAutoDetect)
        Enables auto detection of the current network state based on notifications from the system. Note that passing true here requires the embedding app have the platform ACCESS_NETWORK_STATE permission.
        参数:
        shouldAutoDetect - true if the NetworkMonitor should listen for system changes in network connectivity.

      • addNetworkObserver

        public static void addNetworkObserver(NetworkMonitor.NetworkObserver observer)
        Adds an observer for any connection type changes.

      • removeNetworkObserver

        public static void removeNetworkObserver(NetworkMonitor.NetworkObserver observer)
        Removes an observer for any connection type changes.

      • isOnline

        public static boolean isOnline()
        Checks if there currently is connectivity.

      • getAutoDetectorForTest

        public static NetworkMonitorAutoDetect getAutoDetectorForTest()
